1.content:
You awaken lying on an operating table, a bright light in your face. Your arms and legs are restrained, and you are naked except for your briefs. The last thing you remember, is being on a road on your way south, through Mexico, down to South America. Then, there was a big, blinding light up above, and the next thing you knew, was blacking out, and here you were.
In years passed, people had reported such phenomena, saying they had been abducted by aliens. Recently, however, it had been revealed to the public, that this was a method that special branches of law enforcement, and the government, used to bring people in, especially highly dangerous people. Whether previous such encounters had been the government as well, having implanted false memories of aliens in their victim’s heads, or had been actual alien abductions, was unknown, since the government refused to answer any questions about such events.
At any rate, it was 99 percent sure, that this had been an abduction by the government, and that you would soon be seeing a bunch of clowns in suits, rather than a bunch of little green men. Sure enough, after a few minutes, you look up to see two men and one rather stern woman in business attire, walking in the door.

“Ah,” one of them begins, looking at a chart, apparently reading aloud from it, “John Shanks”
“That’s SHANKS!” you correct.
“Right,” he says, sarcastically, “Mr…John-Sorry-Shanks, mercenary, terrorist, and spy, with experience in three different companies.” (The world, having been taken over by one government, was now divided up into companies, rather than countries. )
“Yeah, so what of it??”

“Well, it seems the First lady, has a bit of an assignment for you,” Says the woman, who is wearing a rather professional looking skirt suit.
“Does it involve some sick fantasy of tying me down to a table, half naked?”
The woman giggles at your predicament, then replies:
“Not exactly, but I’ll let her explain.” Just as she finishes, the door opens, and in comes a tall, stern-looking woman you recognize as the first lady. In her ate 30’s she still has a really hot body, and a nice, strong-looking face.

“Oh great. Here come the Americans!” You say, rolling your eyes.

“Silince!” Says the man standing beside you, as he slaps you in the face. You turn your face towards him, snarling in anger, as you struggle against your bonds.

“Trust me,” says the other man, “You ARE going to want to take on this assignment. Now listen to what the First Lady has to say.
“Thank you, Mr. Jones.” She says to him. “Now then, I will try to be brief, since your time is short, as we will explain, shortly. I am sure you’ve heard of DC, right?”

“That prison colony for fetishists? Yeah, why, you planning a vacation? Need some discipline, Ms First Lady. The man moves to slap you again, and you quickly turn back to him.
“TRY IT, I DARE YA!”
But the first lady quickly waves her hand to stop the two of you.
“Yes, it is indeed a place for unusual criminal cases, and extremely unruly children to be sent, to be diapered and treated as babies. You probably also know about the Super Nannies, genetically inhanced girls who grew to be between 10 and 15 feet tall women, and who now reside over the colony as caregivers. Well, as you may know the colony has been used less and less, of late, due to rumors about the Nannies going crazy, and a rebellion amongst their charges. Supposedly, now, the Nannies attack and babify any pilots who land there.

“Yeah, what does this have to do with me, And Why the Hell Am I Strapped to a Table Half Naked??”

She simply smirks at you.
“Well, you see, my husband, the First Man, has gone and done something rather rash, of late. He and my daughter Clara recently got into a fight, and shortly after, her father, having totally lost all patience with her, called in the Diaper Round Up Gang, or DRUG, a group of ex-security officers, who secretly work for the Nanny’s from outside. We don’t know how the Nannies are contacting them, since no one gets out of there, any more. But the point is, the DRUG has taken her to DC, and she hasn’t been heard from , since. So, your mission, and trust me, you WILL choose to accept it, is to infiltrate the colony, find our daughter, and find a way out of DC. But first, we need to get you properly dressed and equipped. Shannon?” She called. The Door opens, and in walked 40-something woman in a nurse uniform, while the First Lady continues talking.
“You see, if you’re going to go into DC, you need to be dressed like the locals. Anyone caught not wearing diapers, is immediately captures, and subjected to corporal punishment, before being taken to the I C, that is, infant containment.”
“Alright,” cooes the nurse woman, in a very matronly tone, as if speaking to a child, “Let’s just get these off, and get you into a nice, fresh, diaper.”
The woman in the business suit begins snickering, as the nurse reaches for the waistband of your underwear.
“HOLD ON! Wait a minute! I haven’t even agreed to anything yet, you over cocky freaks! I’m not letting you put me in diapers! SCREW THAT!”

“Fine by me,” says the First Lady, matter-of-factly, “ Come on then, Nicole. We can wait till he needs them, later.
“Wait WHAT??” you exclaim, wondering just what the hell she means by that.
“That’s right, Shanks, you’ll be wearing diapers soon enough, either way…”
“What’s that supposed to mean?”
“Oh… I’m sorry,” she says, smugly, “I forgot to mention… You see, we’ve already implanted a device inside you. After..” she checks her watch 71.5 hours, it will activate, rendering your bowels and bladder, completely useless, PERMINATELY! So, you can either where diapers now, or wait till you really need them in a few days, it’s up to you.”

“FINE!” you groan, reluctantly. “Let’s get this over with!”
“Good boy!” she cooes, patronizingly. With that, the nurse begins undoing your underwear, pulling it off of you. Then, you feel your ankle binding being raised up, lifting your legs and butt up off of the table. She slips a diaper under you. By this point, you are trying to blush as little as possible, but the woman in a suit is making this very hard, as she has gone from subtle snickering, to giggling, to laughing out loud.

“Alright , Megan, “the First Lady says, “Let’s go wait for him in the next room..”

“Darn.” She says, with mock disappointment. “Fine.” And the four of them all file out, while the woman begins rubbing oil all over your private parts. You gasp, as you feel her oily finger being shoved up your butt hole. “GEEZE!” You say, under your breath.

“Sorry, Hon,” she cooes, “But we don’t want you getting diapy rash.”
“no, wouldn’t want that, would we?” you sarcastically mumble. Next, she covers you with baby powder, and then wraps a thick, disposable diaper around your loins. For just a moment, you can’t help noticing how soft and fluffy the material feels around your most sensitive parts, you shake your head, dashing such thoughts, as she finally lets you up off the table.
“There!” She says. Then, suddenly, she begins feeling all over your crotch and butt. It’s hard to deny the excitement you feel, just as you had when her hands were rubbing oil all over you.
“Hey, what are you doing!” You say.

“Just making sure it’s got a nice fit!” she says, giving you one last, final pat on your butt.


“Fine!” he said, angrily, but when she comes back, YOU have to be the one to talk to her!”
1.title: Opening

11.content:
You then proceed to walk…er, waddle into the next room, where the rest of them had gone. Inside, you see the four people who you had just spoken with, along with a young lady sitting at a console, with a headset.
When she turns around, you notice it is Tina, a cute, slightly muscular, slightly chubby, lady you had worked with on an espionage mission. You had constantly picked on her, throughout the entire mission, and now, here you are standing in front of her, in nothing but a diaper.

“Well, Johny Boy! Don’t you look adorable!”
“I KNOW, RIGHT?” Says the other lady in the suit.
“Alright, girls.” Says the First Lady.


“I’m sorry Mam, but you can’t deny, he Does look fine in a diaper!”
“The two men just look away, awkwardly, trying to seem as casual as possible.”

“Ok, Tina.” She says, this time, unable to keep from grinning. “Let’s stay focused. Johny boy is running on a tight schedule, so let’s get him briefed, “ the two girls laugh, “and out of here.”

“Right,” says Tina, winking at you, “Might as well make this straight forward, and to the point, no since WETTING IT DOWN!” More laughter.

“Alright, Johny. Look, this is where you’ll come in at.”
She shows you a map on the screen. “We have no idea of where Clara might be, so you’ll have to figure that out, first.” A Picture of Clara comes up on the screen. She is gorgeous, especially for a teenager. Blonde hair, blue eyes, a sweet, cute, face, and a body to die for.

“Now, we’re gonna drop you in, in a special pod we’ve designed, with a cloaking device. This will only last a few minutes, so once you land, you better find some shelter fast. Again, you don’t HAVE to keep that diaper on, but I would advice it, aside from making your butt look really fine,” you blush, “As I’m sure you’ve been told, If the Super Nanny’s catch you without a diaper, you’ll be spanked, and taken immediately to IC. In IC, they don’t even care whether you’re a guy or a girl, anymore. So, unless you fancy panties and dresses, I’d stay away from there. Then again, if you DO wanna get out of your diaper, you might concider finding the rebellion, since they have been the only ones successful in get out of the diapers, and staying away from the Nanny’s . From here, I can’t say weather the rebels will be your friend or you foe. Heck, Clara may very well be with them; you’re just gonna have to find out! If you do wanna find them, we have heard reports that they have been using the train system. See, there is a children’s riding train that goes around the island. It was originally set up to carry supplies, and babies from one part of the island to another, but supposedly, the rebels are now using it themselves. Now then, for the rest of your gear! She gets up, and walks to the closet, bringing out a few things.

“Here is a T-shirt, so you won’t be COMPLETELY exposed,” she puts it on over your head. Now you just feel even MORE babyish, “And you’ll also need this,” she says, as she starts putting a frilly baby bonnet over your head.”
“What? WHY?” You say, almost sounding like a wine.
“Because of THIS” she says, talking into a microphone, which you hear from somewhere in the bonnet.
“And THIS” she says, popping a pacifier into your mouth, that you notice is attached to your shirt with a pink ribbon, “That’s YOUR microphone.”
You blush, deep red, feeling all of 2 feet tall, standing in a room full of people, dressed up like a 1-year old.
“Now then, you better get going, you’re almost down to 71 hours! Just go through that door, and into the pod you’ll see inside. It is automated, and will automatically take you where you need to go.”
You turn back to them, one last, glaring at them angrily, as they struggle not to burst into laughter.
“I Thware!” you start, angrily, pausing when you hear just how babish you sound with the pacifier in your mouth. You take it out before continuing. “I swear! If I get out of this, you’re ALL gonna get a spanking!”
They all burst into hysterics, especially Tina, who quickly pops your pacifier back in your mouth.
“Sure thing, Honey Buns.” She cooes at you, as if talking to a baby. She then grabs you by the shoulders, turning you around. “Now you GET!” She says, patting you on your diapered rear. In the next room, you see a small pod, that looks somewhat like a metallic, space-aged, baby cradle. You hesitantly get in, at which point, it seals up, and you feel it begin to move. You lie there in complete darkness, sucking on your binky, being whisked away to who-knows-where. You being to nod off after awhile from the bordom, and from the soothing vibrations in the pod.
But then, all of a sudden, you are jarred by a sudden voice in your bonnet.
“YOU AWAKE, BABYKINS!”
It scares you for a moment, but then you realize it’s just Tina, and you groan irritably.
“Don’t Go to Sleep, Babe, You’re Almost There!”
“Oh, THUT UP!” You lithp behind the pacifier. Tina just laughs at you. “Oh, this is gonna be FUN, Johny Boy!”
“MY NAME, ITH THANKTH!” You say.
“Whatever you say, Baby Bye!” she cooes. “Anyway, get ready for landing. Remember, after a few minutes, the cloaking device will dissipate, so find shelter, soon. And remember, Mamma’s right here, if you need her! HAHAHAHAHAH!”

You groan behind the pacifier, as you suddenly feel the pod quickly descending. Then, all of a sudden, it spins around upside down, dropping you out on your butt. For once, you are glad to be wearing a diaper.

You stand up, dusting yourself off, and being checking out your surroundings. You see Four Main Buildings: One Looks Like a Hospital, One Looks like a Childrens’ School Building, And One Looks like a Lab, of some sort. The fourth building is pink, and looks like a giant doll-house. You also see a set of train tracks, running away from you.

What will you check out, first?
11.title: DEBRIEFING

choices: I'm a Big Boy! I Should Be a Toddler!
I Probably Should Be a Baby
I Feel Like I'm Just an Infant
111.content:
You decide to just go straight towards the lab. This is probably where Clara went when she first got sent here. You walk towards the complex, noticing several of the giant Nanny's moving around, many of them carrying adult and teen babies with them.

'WOW' you think, 'They told me how big they were, but this is something you have to see to believe!' You pass RIGHT BY several of them, enjoying having the ability to be invisible. Right at that moment, though, you hear a strange sound, and the nearest Nanny looks over at you.

"Well, where did YOU come from, little one!"
You immediately try to rub, but are picked up into the giant woman's arms. "
You must be new here! No Baby of OURS would be diapered so carelessly."

(AWWE,) you hear in your bonnet, (I think he looks CUTE!)

"Come on now, it's time to take you for your trial, sweety." She says, patting you on your diapered butt.

Once inside the building, she hands you off to another woman, who sets you on a sort of scale. You hear a computerized female voice say:
"NEW BABY 205 pounds."

"Now then, lets get you properly diapered, ok?"

She then carries you over to a table, laying you on your back. Then, she removes your diaper.

"Well, she says," at least you got plenty of powder!"

She then slides a huge, thick, cloth diaper, under your bottom, pinning it on, and following it up with a second.
These are even softer than the disposable, and make your loins and butt feel like they are wrapped up in a cloud. Next, she sticks a set of blue, rubber panties on you.

"Now then," she says, picking you, and patting your butt. "That's much better." She holds you against her chest like a real baby, smiling down at you.

"Alright, sweetheart, this is how it works. If you can keep that diaper clean until tomorrow, we will let you be a toddler, while you're hear. But let me ask you. Do you think you are mature enough to be a toddler? Or should we just go ahead and start you off as a baby?"
111.title: The Test

1111.content:
"Well, well, well," she chuckles, causing her massive chest to jiggle

"Alright then, big boy," she cooes, "We will treat you like a toddler for today, during your test, but if you don't pass, you will be sent straight to IC, to be treated like an infant."

"Now, since you're a big boy, I'll ask you. What does Big Boy want to do, first? Go outside, take a nap, or have a snack?"
1111.title: I Should Be a Toddler!

choices: A pink diaper, dress, and frilly panties
A blue diaper, shirt, and overalls
1113.content:
You pretty sure that Clara wouldn't give in to being diapered and had caused some trouble and been sent to IC so it might be in your best interest to start looking there. "I think I'm just an infant," you tell the giantess.

She gets a wide grin on her face. "Oh really," she chuckles, "Well it's first for a baby to volunteer up front for IC but whatever you say now let's get you over there."

The giantess picks you up to her chest and begins taking you out the door and for a short walk outside to the IC. As you look around you can see a large playground with babies playing on it with Nurses watching close by. Soon enough you come up to a giant pink and blue building which you can only guess is the IC. Once inside the nurse holding you walks up to an empty desk with a basket on top. "Hmm I wonder where she is," the woman asks herself, "no problem I'll just leave you here for her."

You are then placed into the basket on the desk and wraps you up in a pink blanket and leaves the IC but not before giving you a kiss on your forehead. You sit alone for a few minutes until another woman, this one a beautiful young redhead with huge breasts walks in from behind the desk and sees you lying in the crib. She walks up to your basket and says, "Oh hello there little baby. Welcome to the IC. Oh your just a little cutie aren't you. Well before we can do anything we need to get you dressed."

The redhead grabs your basket and carries it to the back room into a closet filled with babyish clothing. She sets you on a changing table and takes your blanket on you and says, "Oh I know just what to dress my newest little baby in. It's my favorite little outfit." The woman runs around the room and grabs a bunch of items and comes back and shows you she's picked out...
1113.title: I Feel Like I'm Just an Infant

11131.content:
You are mortified by the horribly embarrassing outfit brought up to you. You start to get up to get away but the redhead has already grabbed you and put you down on her back. She pulls off your old white diaper leaving you completely nude. You are then ran through the process of diapering again as the girly pink diaper is put on you. Next comes the hideous frilly panties and lastly the dress. After your change you look idiotic in your pink dress, diaper, and the stupid bonnet and pacifier you had in the beginning.

"Alright little one I think you need one last thing," the redhead says as she pulls out a new bonnet, "this bonnet looks much better than that dirty one your wearing now."

'Oh no,' you think, 'she's gonna take away my communication!'

The girls on the other end must have heard this and told you, "Don't worry little guy we knew we would loose coms as some point. Just try to get in contact with the rebellion and hopefully they'll have some sort of communica...."

Her voice was cut off as the giant redhead pulled the bonnet off your head and replaces it with the new one. "Oh don't you look adorable," cooes teh giantess, "Now I think it's baby's...
11131.title: You're a Girl

choices: The Kangaroo Room (Mommy and Me time)
111311.content:
The giant red head strolls down the halls, holding you tightly against her plump chest. She carries you over to a room full of giant women dressed similarly to your assigned giantess, only much much larger in physique . Each woman has one baby on each knee. Each baby had a big pacifier strapped to their face with a tube connected to it, the other end of the tube goes all the way to one of the larger woman's nipple. You notice that milk is oozing from all of these tubes, and going into the shrunken babies mouths.

"This is the Cow Room. Most babies in IC are relunctant to eat, so we invested special feeding pacifiers, and hook them to our lunch ladies. Each baby is required to drink one half a gallon of milk per meal." She says slowly rocking you as she sits down in a feeding chair."

She sits you down on her lap, with one leg on each side of her thigh. She unbuttons her uniform blouse, revealing her heavy naked breasts. "Lucky for you, I'm a part time lunch lady, so we can spend some more quality time together." She yanks your microphone pacifier from your mouth, and replaces it with a force feed pacifier. She wedges the tube over her effect nipple, and watches the milk get siphoned out of her nipple, and into the pacifier. The red head giggles as your cheeks puff out, full of milk.

"It helps if you swallow babykins," she cooed, squeezing your cheeks, forcing the milk down your throat. you start to suck and swallow, suck and swallow, into one slow pattern. It didn't take long to feel your stomach slowly fill to its limit. As soon as you felt like you were full, the giant red head pulled the tube from her right nippl, and put it over her left nipple, causing even more milk to flood into your mouth.
Several more minutes went by. At this point you felt like you were gonna pop. You start to try and yank the tube off of the giants nipple, but you were too weak. The red head giggled, and disconnected the tube from her second nipple.

"Alright that's enough for now, the next meal will be in two hours, only five more meals to go for today, yaaaay," she cheered in a whispering tone.

She walks you out of the cow room, and walks you over to...
111311.title: Feeding Time

choices: Climb in Through the Top Window
Just Knock On the Front Door
113.content:
You decide to check out the doll house, first.

"I'm gonna go teck out da doll houth" you inform Tina, as you waddle along towards the house.

"Carefull, Baby Shanks, things aren't always what they seem, here.

It seems harmless enough, from afar. However, as you get closer, you begin to notice that the house is WAY bigger than you thought it was. The door looks to be about 30 feet tall! In fact, you are beggining to wonder weather you should knock on the door, or try to sneak in, some other way.

After searching the paremeter, you find a few options.

Which one will you choose?
113.title: The Doll House

choices: Apoligize and Agree to go See Mommy
Say:"I'm Mommy's New Doll. Where is She?"
1131.content:
You walk around the perimeter, until you notice an open window on the second floor.

"I'm gonna twy that window up there." You say to Tanya, through your pacifier.

"Ok, but be careful, I imagine it won't be as easy climbing, with a diaper on," She giggles, "you wouldn't want your diaper to fall off!"
,
"Wight," you grumble, "tanks."

You then proceed to start climbing the side of the dollhouse. Indeed, the diaper makes things much more difficult, but you finally reach the window, climbing inside.

When you get inside, you immediately see a large man, sitting at a table, eating pie. When he sees you, he stands up and faces you. The first thing you notice, is how big is he, nearly a head taller than you, and somewhat large, apparently half fat, and half muscle. He is dressed in a sort of fuzzy, brown, teddy bear outfit, which consists of nothing more than a hood with ears, in which his face is the bear's mouth, a pair of fuzzy, brown, mittens, a pair of fuzzy slippers, and what looks to be a big, poofy diaper, with a brown, fuzzy diaper cover over it. The back of said diaper cover, has a little brown tail. The rest of his body is exposed, but is naturally quite hairy. But what shocks you even more than his appearance, is what comes comes out of his mouth, next.

"Oh, you naughty naughty baby! Sneaking into Mommy's house like that! I'm gonna take you to Mommy, and I'm tewwing on you!" He says, sounding every bit like a 5-year-old, instead of a grown man.

As he approaches you, you wonder quickly what to do. You have taken men much larger than him before, but maybe it's best to play this smart, instead of with violence.

What should you do?
1131.title: Meet Teddy!

choices: Say Your Sorry, and Agree To Be Good
11311.content:
You rush at him, though you had forgotten about your diaper, which makes movement much clumsier and more difficult.You swing a punch at him, but he easily dodges, before swinging one of his own. He lands it on the side of your head, dazing you for a moment. After recovering, you try a kick, which turns out to be even clumsier than your punch. He easily grabs your leg, leaving you off balance and vulnerable. Next, he quickly comes in and knees you hard in the crotch. Even through the diaper, it hurts like hell, and you double over in pain.

"Awe, poor baby," You hear Tanya cooing through your bonnet, "That must have hurt hims"

Then, while you are still doubled over, and contemplating what you will do to Tanya when you get back, the man in the Teddy costume pulls you over to a chair, and over his lap. You try hard to struggle away, but his strength is unbelievable, and he has you held fast over his lap.

"First, you sneak into Mommy's playhouse uninvited, and then, you try to start trouble!" He scolds, pealing open your diaper, "Naughty little boys who misbehave must be punished-Mommy's orders!"

With that, he begins spanking your bare bottom, hard. This is one of the most humiliating and awkward situations ever. Here you are, dressed in baby clothes, lying over another man's lap, getting a bare bottom spanking. As the stinging blows continue, you realize there is one small consolation: At least he left the diaper under you crotch, so your crotch isn't rubbing right up against his hairy, bare, legs.

Soon, the spanks begin to really hurt, and you suck harder and harder on your pacifier for comfort. By the time he stops, your bottom is stinging all over, and you are whimpering behind your paci.

He lets you up, and refastens your diaper.

"Now, let's go meet your Mommy. Come along with Teddy, like a good boy, or else I'll have to spank you AGAIN." Not wanting a spanking, you reluctantly comply, and start to follow him through the house.

"Awwe, your poor Bottom must hurt, Honey," cooes Tanya, causing you to snarl, which in turn, makes her snicker.

"I know that sucked, Shanks, but maybe you can find some answers from this "mommy", whoever she is...

You are led to a large room, in which several people, mainly men, sit around a huge table, dressed as babies. At one end of the table, is an enormous girl, probably around 20 to 25 feet tall, wearing a dress like a 5-year-old would wear. She gets up and walks over to you. Teddy then explains the whole story to her, after which, she grabs you under your arm pits, and lifts you up to her eye level.

"Well Well Well, did someone get hims a red bottom? Well, at least now I'm sure you'll be a good Baby, and behave...RIGHT?"
11311.title: Spanked By Teddy!

choices: The naughty room (full of rebels) to have some fun...
Julie, the biggest baby in the dollhouse, Mommys favorite baby...
113112.content:
The giant young girl continued to hold you in that demeaning position until you said something. You frantically kick you legs in a violent manner. "Let me down you over sithed bwat!" You yell behind your pacifier microphone.

The girls eyes widens to the size of large dinner plates, "My what a naughty baby we have on our hands."

The big strong men in baby attire nodded in agreement, suckling their pacifiers in unison.

The giant rose up to her feet, and carried you holding you tightly to her chest. No matter how much you struggled, you could t break free from her grip. She takes you over to...
113112.title: Demand To Be Set Free

1131121.content:
The giant little girl carries you into the next room. Inside you see a row of men your size locked into bouncy swings, dangling helplessly. Some wear onesies, some little t-shirts, some just diapers. A few wear baby bonnets on their head, one even bigger and more ridiciulous than your military issued monstrosity. YOu panic as you look around the "naughty room."

To the left is a weird contraption. It looks like a giant knee with a seatbelt and a giant arm coming from it.

"This, my naughty little guy, is the automatic spanking machine."

To the right is a giant, red medical enema bag and a potty training ducky.


"And this is the poopy station. which shall it be?"
1131121.title: The naughty room (full of rebels) to have some ...

choices: force feeds you baby food in a highchair
11313.content:
Cozying up to the alpha-femal may get you the info you need. THe teddy-man leads you down the giant hall to a massive nursery where an amazonian Donna Reed type is cuddling a large doll on a rockingchair.

"Mommy, you're new doll arrived?"

"New DOLL!" Her eyes go wide at the site of you. She tosses the real doll to the side and rushes towards you, scooping you into her arms. "You are dismissed, Teddy, MOmmy needs to tend to the baby, acoochie coo!" She starts ticking you under your chin.

"Mommy, maybe you can tell baby where I can find-"

"May, whata skinny baby," she cuts you off, fingering your abs. "Baby must be starving. I better feed you!"
11313.title: Say:"I'm Mommy's New Doll. Where is...

choices: A Little GIrl's Room Next to a pile of Dolls
1132.content:
You look around and see a ladder leading up to the roof. You climb to the top and see a chimney that looks just small enough for you to shimmy down safely. You climb down slowly doing your best not to loose your grip that is until you lose your footing on one side and fall down to the floor.

The fall was short but it still knocked the wind out of you. It takes you a few minutes to recover but when you are able to you look around and see that you are standing in...
1132.title: Go Down the Chimney

11321.content:
You regain yourself and you look around to see a giant sized nursery. You look up to a giant sized crib and see there is a small bulge in the blanket.

'Maybe Clara is up there,' you think to yourself.

You slowly start to scale the giant crib. It takes you longer than expected with the diaper but you eventually reach the top and slowly slide down to the soft, blanketed mattress. You run over to the head of the bed only to reveal what you that was Clara to only have been a giant sized teddy bear. Defeated, you start to climb back over the crib but then you hear a loud thuds coming closer and closer.

You look towards the door and watch as an absolutely beautiful red-haired giantess walk happily through the door but is shocked as she sees you standing in the crib. You watch as she smiles from ear to ear at the sight of you run and runs up to the crib.

"Oh hello there little one!" she says, "Oh I'm so happy they finally sent a little baby over to take care of! Now I think baby needs...
11321.title: A Nursery

113211.content:
"What a Dirty, Messy, Baby we have here!" She says as she scoops you up into her arms, "You are also very naughty, climbing down the chimney like that! You could get HURT! I'm afraid Baby will have to be punished, but first, let's get you cleaned up, Sweety."

info.brief_description: An ABDL spoof, based on "Escape From NY", Femdom, Giantesses, BDSM, and Breastfeeding.
info.description:
In the future, you have been called on for a special assignment: to infiltrate the max security island, known as DC (Diaper Colony, or Day Care), rescue the President's daughter, and escape with dry, clean nappies.
I plan to have this be one of those stories that only has one ending that ends "SUPER GOOD" (IE: He walks away, WITHOUT having to be stuck in diapers the rest of his life, which for some people, may not be the BEST ending, lol) in EVERY other route, he ends up stuck in diapers for one reason or another.

Rules:
*No Killing off the Main Character
*If you plan to end the story, let me know first.
* STICK TO THE SUBJECT MATTER
